DFG question content: How does your project generate new data?

The most similar question in Horzon Euro: What is the origin/provenance of the data, either generated or re-used?

DFG question content: Which data types (in terms of data formats like image data, text data or measurement data) arise in your project and in what way are they further processed? To what extent do these arise or what is the anticipated data volume?
The most similar question in Horzon Euro: What is the expected size of the data that you intend to generate or re-use?
The second most similar question in Horz: Who will be responsible for data management in your project?

DFG question content: What approaches are being taken to describe the data in a comprehensible manner (such as the use of available metadata, documentation standards or ontologies)?
The most similar question in Horzon Euro: Will metadata be offered in such a way that it can be harvested and indexed?

DFG question content: What measures are being adopted to ensure high data quality? Are quality controls in place and if so, how do they operate?

DFG question content: How is the data to be stored and archived throughout the project duration?
